servlet.name: Macro Placeholder Servlet
servlet.description: Generates a placeholder image for macros

servlet.description: Generates a placeholder image for just the icon of macros

servlet.description: Generates a placeholder heading image for macros

servlet.name: Unknown Attachment Placeholder Servlet
servlet.description: Generates a placeholder for unknown attachments

TinyMCE Editor Autocomplete Javascript without dependencies
Confluence Page Editor Javascript resources only
Confluence Page Editor CSS resources only
TinyMCE Editor Autocomplete Javascript

web-resource.name: TinyMCE Editor Javascript for Confluence frontend
Bookmark Manager Javascript for Confluence frontend

servlet-filter.name: Servlet Context Thread Local Filter
servlet-filter.description: Used to ensure Servlet Context is available to REST resources.

decorator.name: vanilla
decorator.description: Decorator to allow HTML served by REST resources to be undecorated

xwork.name: TinyMCE Actions
xwork.description: Xwork actions for TinyMCE link and image editing.

web-item.name: Insert Menu Link - Info Macro
web-item.description: Displays an Info Macro link in the TinyMCE Insert menu.

web-item.name: Insert Menu Link - Gallery Macro
web-item.description: Displays a Gallery Macro link in the TinyMCE Insert menu

web-item.name: Insert Menu Link - Table of Contents Macro
web-item.description: Displays a Table of Contents Macro link in the TinyMCE Insert menu

web-panel.description: Embeds data for displaying Image Properties Dialog tabs into the editor markup.
